articles.title: Italtile CEO steps down, plans to emigrate to Europe - News24
articles.description: Tile and bathroom fixture retailer Italtile has announced that CEO Jan Potgieter will the leave the company at the end of the year after eight years at the helm. He plans to emigrate to Europe, but will remain as a non-executive director of the board.
articles.content:
Tile and bathroom fixture retailer Italtile has announced that CEO Jan Potgieter will the leave the company at the end of the year after eight years at the helm.

articles.author: Sean Martin
articles.title: Asteroid simulation by NASA and ESA confirms Earth not prepared for major strike - Daily Express
articles.description: AN ASTEROID simulation event held by NASA and the European Space Agency has confirmed has one thing: eventually, a major asteroid is going to strike our planet and we need to prepare better for it.

articles.author: Jon Lockett
articles.title: Couple moves into Europe’s first 3D-printed house as developer claims homes can be built in FIVE DAYS... - The Irish Sun
articles.content:
A DUTCH couple has moved into Europes first fully 3D-printed house -which could change the way we live in the future.
